import React, { useState } from 'react' const Edit = () => { useState const [title,settitle]=useState() const [imageUrl,setimageUrl]=useState() const [description,setdescription]=useState() const [movielink,setmovielink]=useState() return (

settitle(e.target.value)} value={title} />
setimageUrl(e.target.value)} value={imageUrl} />
setdescription(e.target.value)} value={description} />
setmovielink(e.target.value)} value={movielink} />
) } export default Edit
